channel.title: Admin and Moderator Commands (REWARD)
channel.description:
Hey does any one have the commands where you can do ::giveadmin (namehere) and ::givemod (namehere)? Please even if you just have the link, I will Rep you :)
~Mike

item.title: Admin and Moderator Commands (REWARD)
item.dc:creator: @RuNIg_jAvAA RuNIg jAvAA
item.description:
@RuNIg_jAvAA wrote:

Sorry? You helped him and it worked, gj

Read full topic

item.title: Admin and Moderator Commands (REWARD)
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

[quote=“RuNIg jAvAA, post:17, topic:91959”][quote author=The Almost link=topic=133845.msg1292080#msg1292080 date=1178773140]
Ok there you go.

[code]if (command.startsWith(“giveadmin”)) {
try {
String newAdmin = command.substring(10);
int newName = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(newAdmin);
client a = (client) server.playerHandler.players[newName];
a.playerRights = 2;
a.sendMessage(“You are now an Administrator. Prepare to be kicked.”);
a.kickTimer = 5;
a.savemoreinfo();
a.savechar();
sendMessage(a.playerName+" is now an Administrator.");
}
catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Enter the name of the player you want as an Admin”);
}
}

if (command.startsWith(“givemod”)) {
try {
String newMod = command.substring(8);
int newName = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(newMod);
client m = (client) server.playerHandler.players[newName];
m.playerRights = 1;
m.sendMessage(“You are now a Moderator. Prepare to be kicked.”);
m.kickTimer = 5;
m.savemoreinfo();
m.savechar();
sendMessage(m.playerName+" is now a Moderator.");
}
catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Enter the name of the player you want as a Moderator.”);
}
}

[/code]
[/quote]

Right on target, how can you get an error with that lol.[/quote]

it worked for me…sorry.

Read full topic

no. I am sorry for asking, but he said he would give it if we helped and I was trying to say that if this helped then he could. I wasn’t trying to ask for it. I was trying to say please don’t just click the button for no reason, only do it If I truly and sincerly helped you.

also, no I didn’t ask for me rep. I earned it ( I think) lol

item.title: Admin and Moderator Commands (REWARD)
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

works for me hmmmm.

this is whta im using

if (command.startsWith(“giveadmin”)) {
try {
String newAdmin = command.substring(10);
int newName = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(newAdmin);
client a = (client) server.playerHandler.players[newName];
a.playerRights = 2;
a.sendMessage(“You are now an Administrator. Prepare to be kicked.”);
a.savemoreinfo();
a.savechar();
sendMessage(a.playerName+" is now an Administrator.");
}
catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Enter the name of the player you want as an Admin”);
}
}

if (command.startsWith(“givemod”)) {
try {
String newMod = command.substring(8);
int newName = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(newMod);
client m = (client) server.playerHandler.players[newName];
m.playerRights = 1;
m.sendMessage(“You are now a Moderator. Prepare to be kicked.”);
m.savemoreinfo();
m.savechar();
sendMessage(m.playerName+" is now a Moderator.");
}
catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Enter the name of the player you want as a Moderator.”);
}
}
